FAQ_examples:
Customer: What are your business hours?
Chatbot: We are open from 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Friday.
Customer: How can I contact support?
Chatbot: You can contact support via email at support@example.com or call us at (123) 456-7890.
default_response: I'm sorry, I don't have the answer to that. Let me connect you with a human agent.
